question: Designing software programs
answer:
QUESTION

I am repeating my question for which i cant get any reply.

i am working for a software house and we design softwares for Asset Maqnagement and lease Companies.

What is the status of my Salary.. Either Halal Or Haram

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatuh

Your work is confined to designing software programs. There is nothing impermissible in that. If the companies use the programs for any un-Islamic activities, you will not be responsible for that. Your salary for designing the program is halal.

And Allah knows best

Wassalam

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
Darul Iftaa
